reproducibility.description: This metric pertains to whether the code used for constructing the dataset is made publicly available or not for reproducibility.

has_code.description: Set to true if all code related to data collection, preprocessing, and generation is publicly available in an accessible repository (e.g., GitHub).

reference.description: The location in the paper where the code is described (e.g., 'Section 4.1').

reasoning.description: Justification based on the paper content explaining why the code is said to be available or not in the paper.
